hypothesis: Niching CMA-ES can maintain multiple local optima simultaneously, improving the diversity component of the scoring (0.3 * N_valid/3)

tuning_runs.notes: FAILED - Score dropped significantly. Taboo regions push CMA-ES to suboptimal solutions.
Ran baseline with polish on 20 samples to understand current diversity

best_in_budget.notes: Niching approach failed to beat baseline. Baseline already achieves near-maximum diversity.

key_findings: CRITICAL: Scoring formula AVERAGES accuracy over all valid candidates
Adding worse diverse candidates HURTS the score more than the diversity term helps
Taboo-based niching pushes CMA-ES to suboptimal solutions
Baseline already achieves ~2.75 N_valid average (near maximum of 3)
Diversity improvement is NOT a viable path - focus on accuracy instead
